trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Configuration requise pour Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Configuration requise pour Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the system requirements for [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], and for special features, such as [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)], CIM commands, and workflows.
trans-unit.target: Cette rubrique répertorie la configuration requise pour [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], et pour des fonctionnalités spéciales, telles que [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)], des commandes CIM et des flux de travail.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_1](../Token/winblue_client_1_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)] include all required programs.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_1](../Token/winblue_client_1_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)] incluent tous les programmes requis.

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed for users of earlier releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Cette rubrique est conçue pour les utilisateurs de versions antérieures de Windows.

trans-unit.source: Operating System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Systèmes d'exploitation requis

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] s’exécute sur les versions suivantes de Windows.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], installé par défaut

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], installé par défaut

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] avec Service Pack 1, installer [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) pour exécuter [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] avec Service Pack 1, installer [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) pour exécuter [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] s’exécute sur les versions suivantes de Windows.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], installé par défaut

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], installé par défaut

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] avec Service Pack 1, installer [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) pour exécuter [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] avec Service Pack 1, installer [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) pour exécuter [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] with Service Pack 2, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] avec Service Pack 2, installer [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) pour exécuter [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Microsoft .NET Framework Requirements
trans-unit.target: Configuration requise pour Microsoft .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requiert l’installation complète de Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] incluent Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 par défaut.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] requiert l’installation complète de Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default, which fulfills this requirement.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] incluent Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 par défaut, ce qui répond à cette exigence.

trans-unit.source: To install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Pour installer Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe), voir [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) sur le Centre de téléchargement Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: To install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Pour effectuer l’installation complète de Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe), voir [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (programme d’installation web)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) sur le Centre de téléchargement Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: WS\-Management 3.0
trans-unit.target: WS-Management 3.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] require WS\-Management 3.0, which supports the WinRM service and WSMan protocol.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requièrent WS-Management 3.0, qui prend en charge le service WinRM et le protocole WSMan.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0, and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ce programme est inclus dans [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0 et [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0
trans-unit.target: WMI (Windows Management Instrumentation) 3.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] require Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requièrent WMI (Windows Management Instrumentation) 3.0.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0, and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ce programme est inclus dans [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0 et [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If this program is not installed on the computer, features that require WMI, such as CIM commands, do not run.
trans-unit.target: Si ce programme n’est pas installé sur l’ordinateur, les fonctionnalités qui requièrent WMI, telles que les commandes CIM, ne fonctionnent pas.

trans-unit.source: Common Language Runtime 4.0
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] are compiled against Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] sont compilés avec Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.

trans-unit.source: Graphical User Interface Requirements
trans-unit.target: Configuration requise de l’interface graphique utilisateur

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is a console\-based application that does not require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] est une application console qui ne requiert pas d’interface graphique utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: As such, is it well suited to computers that do not have screens or monitors, or a user interface, such as the Server Core installation options of [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Par conséquent, elle convient particulièrement pour des ordinateurs qui n’ont pas d’écran, de moniteur ou d’interface utilisateur, telles que les options d’installation Server Core de [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, some items, such as the following, require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, certains éléments, tels les suivants, requièrent une interface graphique utilisateur.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the help topic for each item.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la rubrique d’aide de chaque élément.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Applets de commande

trans-unit.source: Out-GridView
trans-unit.target: Out-GridView

trans-unit.source: Show-Command
trans-unit.target: Show-Command

trans-unit.source: Show-ControlPanelItem
trans-unit.target: Show-ControlPanelItem

trans-unit.source: Show-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Show-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Paramètres

trans-unit.source: **ShowWindow** parameter of the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Paramètre **ShowWindow** de l’applet de commande [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a).

trans-unit.source: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUi** parameter of the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) and [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Paramètre **ShowSecurityDescriptorUi** des applets de commande [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) et [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea).

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Engine Requirements
trans-unit.target: Configuration requise pour le moteur Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] is designed to be backwards compatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] est conçu pour offrir une compatibilité descendante avec [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] run unchanged in [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Les applets de commande, fournisseurs, composants logiciels enfichables, modules et scripts écrits pour [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] s’exécutent sans modification dans [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] host programs that were written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, en raison d’une modification de la stratégie d’activation du runtime de Microsoft .NET Framework 4, les programmes hôtes de [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] écrits pour [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] et compilés avec Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 ne peuvent pas s’exécuter sans modification dans [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] qui est compilé avec CLR 4.0.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: Le moteur [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] nécessite au minimum Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Cette condition est remplie par Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is not fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and later releases of Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Cette condition n’est pas remplie par Microsoft .NET Framework 4 et versions ultérieures de Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For information about adding or installing the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine, and adding or installing the required versions of the Microsoft .NET Framework, see [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur l’ajout ou l’installation du moteur [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], et l’ajout ou l’installation des versions requises de Microsoft .NET Framework, voir [Installation du moteur Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur le démarrage du moteur [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], voir [Démarrage du moteur Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: Environnement de préinstallation Windows

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] run in the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]et [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] s’exécutent dans l’environnement de préinstallation Windows (Windows PE).

trans-unit.source: However, the following cmdlets are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, les applets de commande suivantes ne sont pas pris en charge.

trans-unit.source: Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Applets de commande du service de transfert intelligent en arrière-plan (BITS)

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-WinEvent[PSITPro5_Diagnostic]
trans-unit.target: Get-WinEvent[PSITPro5_Diagnostic]

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Update-Help
trans-unit.target: Update-Help

trans-unit.source: Also, the **WinRm** service is not present on Windows PE.
trans-unit.target: En outre, le service **WinRm** n’est pas présent sur Windows PE.
